completed.title: Calculate if the object is in viewport or not. Only viewport objects are drawn.
details: Implemented a system to calculate whether objects are inside the viewport. This avoids unnecessary rendering of off-screen elements, improving performance.

completed.title: Optimized the Pine Tree Class
details: Implemented pre-rendering for all pine tree layers and stored the rendered images in an array. During drawing, pre-rendered images are used instead of recalculating points and redrawing each frame. This significantly reduces CPU usage.

Added a mechanism to check if a pine tree with the same size has already been generated. If a matching size is found, the current tree references the pre-rendered images of the existing tree, reducing memory usage.

completed.title: Minimap Rendering Refactor and Separate Events
details: Separated the minimap rendering onto a new dedicated canvas element, distinct from the main simulation canvas.
Pre-rendered non-movable objects on the minimap to avoid redundant calculations and improve performance.
Implemented real-time updates for movable objects on the minimap canvas, ensuring accurate representation of the simulation state.
Enabled the addition of separate minimap-specific events, such as dragging the viewport rectangle to adjust the world camera position.

pending.title: Add Water Areas
details: Add water areas to the world.
Implement real-time updates when creatures interact with water areas.

pending.title: Camera and Touch Controls Going Out of Bounds
details: When exploring the world using key controls, the explorer cannot go out of bounds. However, with touch and mouse controls, the explorer can travel infinitely.

pending.title: Improve Water Interaction and Effects
details: Enhance the water interaction system to ensure objects and creatures behave realistically when in contact with water.
Refine water surface effects, such as waves and ripples, for a more immersive visual experience.
Add water splashing effects when creatures or objects move through water.

pending.title: Minimap Event for Camera Positioning
details: Allow users to click and drag the rectangle representing the current viewport on the minimap. Moving the rectangle adjusts the world camera's position proportionally to the minimap-to-world size ratio.

pending.title: World Boundary Concealment
details: Design and implement a method to visually conceal the edges of the world to maintain immersion, such as adding dense forests, clouds, or other natural elements.
Ensure the chosen solution aligns with the theme of the 'Insect Realm,' creating a cohesive and believable environment.
Consider performance and resource usage while designing the boundary concealment to avoid impacting overall simulation efficiency.
